column5: Hi,  Just want to ask where can I buy a kayak which can fit into a medium size car's trunk? I live in an apartment and no storage space. Any company made short size kayak?  Thanks in advance!
I would suggest a decent inflatable, Sevylor products come to mind. I don't have any experience with them but I'm certain someone will chime in.
An inflatable is the way to go. If you have the $$$$ look at good quality boats such as Aire, Sea Eagle, Innova or Advanced Elements.
Don't know what you are using it for but check out the OSG Commander http://www.outcastboats.com/outcast/products/?id=43
Thanks for advise. Inflatable is not the one I want. I still interested in the Kayak.
You can always get the Tequila from point 65. It collapses and goes together in 10 seconds.  http://www.point65.com/Default.asp?page=kayaks&kayak=38
This looks like a fun little yak
